Description: Documentation for postDelayed:  Causes the Runnable r to be added to the message queue, to be run after the specified amount of time elapses. Message: Implement undo snackbar when deleting messages by swiping.
Description: When swiping away a message it is only removed from the local message lists and a snackbar appears. When the snackbar is dismissed or the user deletes another message the delete request is sent to the server. If the user presses "undo" on the snackbar the message is reinserted into the local lists at its previous position.
